trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Marion
There were no other sightings in Marion on or around August 3rd 2012
Summary: Looked like some spot lights but they were about the clouds and did not illuminate from the ground. The six or eight objects went around in circles but nerver went beyond the clouds. The circles disappeared once the clouds moved away.
divs: Sighting DetailsLooked like some spot lights but they were about the clouds and did not illuminate from the ground. The six or eight objects went around in circles but nerver went beyond the clouds. The circles disappeared once the clouds moved away.
